questions.question: Who passed away on Halloween from a ruptured appendix?

questions.title: Harry Houdini
questions.description: Harry Houdini was a famous American magician known for his sensational escape acts. Some of his acts included escaping from handcuffs, coffins and sunken crates.

questions.question: What is the origin of wearing costumes on Halloween?

choices.answer: According to Ancient Egypt, it was to have a good harvest.
According to Ancient Roman, it was to welcome ghosts.
According to Ancient Celtics, it was to ward off ghosts.
According to Ancient Inca, it was to entertain ghosts.

questions.question: What do the colors black and orange represent on this holiday?

choices.answer: Black is for the dead and orange for the living
Black is for the night and orange for the sun
Black is for the night and orange for the autumn colors
